name: Vintage Colourful Linear Dress
description:
Label: None
Material: Polyester
Condition: Excellent

Description:
- Non-sheer
- Buttoned-down blouse with matching fabric buttons
- Mandarin collar
- Pleated skirt
- Concealed zip on the front of the skirt
- 5 buttons down the chest & 1 button on each sleeve (all buttons intact)
- Long blouson sleeves
- Elastic waist
- Fully lined (except sleeves)
- Comes with a thin sash to tie at the waist

Measurements (across):
Shoulder: 37 cm
Bust (Underarm-to-underarm): 47 cm
Waist: 37 - 50 cm (elastic)
Length (shoulder to hem): 104 cm
Armhole: 20 cm
Sleeve length: 56 cm
Sleeve hem (when buttoned): 9 cm

Note:
1. Dress is worn on a 1.7 m tall size 6 (Eur 34/36) model.
2. Please allow for up to 2 cm variance for measurements.

More pictures available on Facebook at www.facebook.com/vintageshabbychic or www.letresorcache.blogspot.com

Item would be shipped via normal airmail. Registered airmail is available at an additional USD1.70 on top of listed shipping rates. I ship worldwide. Please contact me for shipping rates for your country / combined shipping.

name: Vintage Japanese Yellow Kaleidoscope Dress
description:
Label: Tokyo Style
Condition: Excellent
Material: 30% Polyester, (Can't make out the Japanese words on the 70%), Feels like Linen.

Description:
- Non-sheer
- Buttoned-down on left chest
- Piping along collar & blouse flap
- Single pleat on right & left, on front & back
- Concealed zip on the front of the skirt
- 4 buttons down the chest & 1 button (decorative) on each sleeve (all buttons intact)
- 3 quarter length sleeves
- Shoulder pads
- Interior lining (skirt)
- 2 yarn belt hoops at the sides

Measurements (across):
Shoulder: 40 cm
Bust (Underarm-to-underarm): 50 cm
Waist: 45 cm
Hip: 56 cm
Length (shoulder to hem): 110 cm
Armhole: 23 cm
Sleeve length: 44 cm
Sleeve hem: 14 cm

Note:
1. Dress is worn on a 1.7 m tall size 6 (Eur 34/36) model.
2. Please allow for up to 2 cm variance for measurements.
3. Belt is not included.

More pictures available on Facebook at www.facebook.com/vintageshabbychic or www.letresorcache.blogspot.com

Item would be shipped via normal airmail. Registered airmail is available at an additional USD1.70 on top of listed shipping rates. I ship worldwide. Please contact me for shipping rates for your country / combined shipping.

name: Vintage Japanese Mint Green Dress
description:
Label: None
Material: Polyester

Description:

- Concealed zip on the skirt front from waist down
- Princess sleeves with tiny pleats
